text: Tapurucuara Airport is an airport serving the Querari River village of Tapurucuara in the Vaupés Department of Colombia. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Tapurucuara * *FallingRain - Tapurucuara Airport *Google Maps - Tapurucuara *HERE/Nokia - Tapurucuara Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Tapurucuara Airport
